title: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description:
Bug 37021 - There is an issue with the source path in declare warning messages on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the problem, please follow the steps below:

1. Navigate to the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' directory.
2. Run the provided code to observe the problem.

Please note that these tests have some limitations. They may return false positives because filename checking is not enabled in the harness verification of messages. In AJDT, if the filename doesn't make sense, it might be omitted.
OB: There is no information about the observed behavior provided in the bug report.
EB: In declare warning messages, when targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath is incorrectly listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
SR:
1. Navigate to the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' directory.
2. Run the provided code to observe the issue with the source path in declare warning messages on binary files.
